title: Should people call the police if they see the new flat guinea worm?
subtitle: Allegations that these invasive species represent an emergency at the level of 911 overestimates the risk they pose to humans, mixing ecological risks with medical risks.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The recent invasion of the flotilla New Guinea worms in Florida poses a serious threat to human health and the authorities should be informed of the vision of this non-indigenous animal by dialling 911.
